Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Dante
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Dante.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/Dante.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
